Author: SHybrid
Text: I wear steel-boned corsets for aesthetics and elegance, so not constantly but at the time I also tried waist training. It will eventually make you eat less 'cause eating will literally be painful so yeah maybe you lose some weight but it's a gatherer for cellulite, liquids and circolatory problems so not worth it. Also the marks on the body, red stripes all over the core all the time.

Author: hondaceviche
Text: I used to wear one during workouts, I'd say it's a good reminder to keep your core tight, definitely has a psychological effect of "feeling skinnier" which made me a little less impulsive. I wanna say it helped but I was also working out 7 days a week and eating super clean, so... it was probably that more than anything.  But I also wouldn't wear one all day every day, you really need good circulation in your midsection for digestion/etc.
